languages.text: "Не знаю, что именно вы хотите узнать, но я начну с самого начала. Множество лет назад на трон Орселлио взошла Тисифона — ослепительный новатор, что привела часть Дома в Простор, надеясь укрепить наше положение в Империуме. Дом расцветал, но Тисифоне все было мало — она помешалась на обретении силы, желала больше власти, больше контроля — и во всех видела врагов, даже в верных последователях".

traits.locale_text: "Не знаю, что именно вы хотите узнать, но я начну с самого начала. Множество лет назад на трон Орселлио взошла Тисифона — ослепительный новатор, что привела часть нашего дома в Коронус, надеясь укрепить наше положение в Империуме. Дом расцветал, но Тисифоне все было мало — она помешалась на обретении силы, желала больше власти, больше контроля — и во всех видела врагов, даже в верных последователях".
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "I do not know what it is you wish to learn, but I will start from the very beginning. A long time ago, Tisiphone ascended to the throne of Orsellio — she was a daring Novator who brought part of the House to the Expanse, hoping to strengthen our position in the Imperium. The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю, что именно вы хотите узнать, но я начну с самого начала. Множество лет назад на трон Орселлио взошла Тисифона — ослепительный новатор, что привела часть Дома в Простор, надеясь укрепить наше положение в Империуме. Дом расцветал, но Тисифоне все было мало — она помешалась на обретении силы, желала больше власти, больше контроля — и во всех видела врагов, даже в верных последователях".

traits.locale_text: "I do not know what is it you wish to learn, but I will start from the very beginning. A long time ago Tisiphone ascended to the throne of Orsellio —a daring novator who brought a part of her House into Koronus hoping to strengthen our position in the Imperium. The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control — and saw enemies everywhere, even among loyal followers."
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control — and saw enemies everywhere, even among loyal followers."

The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."

The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."

traits.locale_text: "I do not know what it is you wish to learn, but I will start from the very beginning. A long time ago, Tisiphone ascended to the throne of Orsellio — she was a daring Novator who brought part of the House to the Expanse, hoping to strengthen our position in the Imperium. The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “我不知道您想知道些什么，但我愿意从最开始说起。很久以前，提西福涅登上了奥赛罗家族的王位。她是位勇于开拓的大族长，她将家族的一部分人带到了科罗努斯扩区，打算加强我们在帝国之中的地位。我们的家族蓬勃发展，但提西福涅却从不知足。她始终都在渴求更大的影响力与权力，而在追逐权力的过程中，她变成了个疯子。在她的眼里，敌人无处不在，甚至连她忠诚的追随者都成了她眼中的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "I do not know what it is you wish to learn, but I will start from the very beginning. A long time ago, Tisiphone ascended to the throne of Orsellio — she was a daring Novator who brought part of the House to the Expanse, hoping to strengthen our position in the Imperium. The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道您想知道些什么，但我愿意从最开始说起。很久以前，提西福涅登上了奥塞罗家族的王位。她是位勇于开拓的大族长，她将家族的一部分人带到了科罗努斯扩区，打算加强我们在帝国之中的地位。我们的家族蓬勃发展，但提西福涅却从不知足。她始终都在渴求更大的影响力与权力，而在追逐权力的过程中，她变成了个疯子。在她的眼里，敌人无处不在，甚至连她忠诚的追随者都成了她眼中的敌人。”
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «No sé lo que busca aprender, pero empezaré por el principio. Hace mucho tiempo, Tisiphone ascendió al trono de Orsellio. Era una Novator audaz que trajo parte de la casa a la Extensión para intentar reforzar nuestra posición en el Imperium. La casa prosperó, pero eso no le bastaba a Tisiphone, que enloqueció en su constante búsqueda de poder, influencia y control. Veía enemigos por todas partes, incluyendo entre sus seguidores».
languages.original_text: "I do not know what it is you wish to learn, but I will start from the very beginning. A long time ago, Tisiphone ascended to the throne of Orsellio — she was a daring Novator who brought part of the House to the Expanse, hoping to strengthen our position in the Imperium. The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."

traits.locale_text: «No sé lo que busca aprender, pero empezaré por el principio. Hace mucho tiempo, Tisiphone ascendió al trono de Orsellio. Era una Novator audaz que trajo parte de la casa a la Extensión para intentar reforzar nuestra posición en el Imperium. La casa prosperó, pero eso no le bastaba a Tisiphone, que enloqueció en su constante búsqueda de poder, influencia y control. Veía enemigos por todas partes, incluyendo entre sus seguidores».
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「何を知りたいのかはしらないけれど、最初からお話ししてあげましょう。はるか昔、ティシフォンがオーセリオの王位に就いた…彼女は大胆なノベイターで、帝国における我が家の地位を強化しようと、家門の一部をエクスパンスに持ち込んだ。家門は繁栄したが、ティシフォンは決して満足しなかった。彼女は権力を追求するあまり狂い、より大きな影響力と支配力を求め、忠実な信奉者の中にも至る所に敵を見出した」
languages.original_text: "I do not know what it is you wish to learn, but I will start from the very beginning. A long time ago, Tisiphone ascended to the throne of Orsellio — she was a daring Novator who brought part of the House to the Expanse, hoping to strengthen our position in the Imperium. The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."

traits.locale_text: 「何を知りたいのかはしらないけれど、最初からお話ししてあげましょう。はるか昔、ティシフォンがオーセリオの王位に就いた…彼女は大胆なノベイターで、帝国における我が家の地位を強化しようと、家門の一部をエクスパンスに持ち込んだ。家門は繁栄したが、ティシフォンは決して満足しなかった。彼女は権力を追求するあまり狂い、より大きな影響力と支配力を求め、忠実な信奉者の中にも至る所に敵を見出した」
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, was Ihr zu erfahren hofft, aber ich werde ganz vorne beginnen. Vor langer Zeit bestieg Tisiphone den Thron von Orsellio – sie war eine wagemutige Novatorin, die einen Teil des Hauses in die Ausdehnung brachte, in der Hoffnung, unsere Stellung im Imperium zu stärken. Das Haus gedieh, aber Tisiphone war nie zufrieden – sie wurde in ihrem Machtstreben wahnsinnig, wollte mehr Einfluss, mehr Kontrolle, und sie sah überall Feinde, sogar unter ihren treuen Anhängern."
languages.original_text: "I do not know what it is you wish to learn, but I will start from the very beginning. A long time ago, Tisiphone ascended to the throne of Orsellio — she was a daring Novator who brought part of the House to the Expanse, hoping to strengthen our position in the Imperium. The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, was Ihr zu erfahren hofft, aber ich werde ganz vorne beginnen. Vor langer Zeit bestieg Tisiphone den Thron von Orsellio – sie war eine wagemutige Novatorin, die einen Teil des Hauses in die Ausdehnung brachte, in der Hoffnung, unsere Stellung im Imperium zu stärken. Das Haus gedieh, aber Tisiphone war nie zufrieden – sie wurde in ihrem Machstreben wahnsinnig, wollte mehr Einfluss, mehr Kontrolle, und sie sah überall Feinde, sogar unter ihren treuen Anhängern."
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « J'ignore ce que vous voulez savoir au juste, je commencerai donc par le commencement. Il y a fort longtemps, Tisiphone est montée sur le trône des Orsellio. Elle s'est révélée être une Novator intrépide. Dans l'espoir de renforcer notre position dans l'Imperium, elle a même envoyé une partie de notre maison dans les Étendues, et pendant un temps, notre maison prospéra. Mais Tisiphone n'était jamais satisfaite. Assoiffée de pouvoir, d'influence et de contrôle, elle voyait des ennemis partout, même parmi ses serviteurs les plus fidèles. »
languages.original_text: "I do not know what it is you wish to learn, but I will start from the very beginning. A long time ago, Tisiphone ascended to the throne of Orsellio — she was a daring Novator who brought part of the House to the Expanse, hoping to strengthen our position in the Imperium. The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."

traits.locale_text: « J'ignore ce que vous voulez savoir au juste, je commencerai donc par le commencement. Il y a fort longtemps, Tisiphone est montée sur le trône des Orsellio. Elle s'est révélée être une Novator intrépide. Dans l'espoir de renforcer notre position dans l'Imperium, elle a même envoyé une partie de notre maison dans les Étendues, et pendant un temps, notre maison prospéra. Mais Tisiphone n'était jamais satisfaite. Assoiffée de pouvoir, d'influence et de contrôle, elle voyait des ennemis partout, même parmi ses serviteurs les plus fidèles. »
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Öğrenmek istediğiniz şey nedir bilmiyorum ama en başından başlayayım. Uzun zaman önce Tisiphone, Orsellio tahtına çıktı. Hane'nin bir bölümünü Enginlik'e getiren ve bu sayede İmparatorluk'taki konumumuzu güçlendireceğini uman, atılgan bir Rota Reisi'ydi. Hane refaha kavuştu ancak Tisiphone tatmin olmak bilmiyordu. Delice güç peşinde koşuyor; sürekli daha fazla nüfuz kazanmaya, daha fazla kontrol elde etmeye çalışıyordu. Kendi sadık takipçileri de dâhil nereye baksa düşman görüyordu."
languages.original_text: "I do not know what it is you wish to learn, but I will start from the very beginning. A long time ago, Tisiphone ascended to the throne of Orsellio — she was a daring Novator who brought part of the House to the Expanse, hoping to strengthen our position in the Imperium. The House prospered but Tisiphone was never satisfied — she went mad in her pursuit of power, seeking more influence, more control, and she saw enemies everywhere, even among her loyal followers."

traits.locale_text: "Öğrenmek istediğiniz şey nedir bilmiyorum ama en başından başlayayım. Uzun zaman önce Tisiphone, Orsellio tahtına çıktı. Hane'nin bir bölümünü Enginlik'e getiren ve bu sayede İmparatorluk'taki konumumuzu güçlendireceğini uman, atılgan bir Rota Reisi'ydi. Hane bu sayede refaha kavuştu ancak Tisiphone tatmin olmuyordu. Delice güç peşinde koşuyor, sürekli daha fazla nüfuz kazanmaya, daha fazla kontrol elde etmeye çalışıyordu ve nereye baksa düşman görüyordu. Kendi sadık takipçileri arasında bile."
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader
